sentences.sContent: The contrast could not have been made more explicit.
sentences.sCn: 这个对比再清楚不过了。

sentences.sContent: The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
sentences.sCn: 绑匪明确告诉我们不许报警。

sentences.sContent: Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
sentences.sCn: 与家人谈钱的问题要直截了当。

synos.tran: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ pli(重) ＋ cit → 重复地说出 → 详述的， 明确的

trans.tranOther: expressed in a way that is very clear and direct
